client_id.title: Client ID
client_id.description: The Client ID of your Avoma developer application.

client_secret.title: Client Secret
client_secret.description: The Client Secret of your Avoma developer application.

bearer_token.title: Bearer Token
bearer_token.description: The token for obtaining the new access token.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which you'd like to replicate data for Avoma API, in the format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z. All data generated after this date will be replicated.

max_api_requests.description: The maximum number of api requests per airbyte run. Use in combination with frequency to make sure to not surpass daily limit (aprox. 100,000 requests per day, and 10,000 per hour).
